biweekly.io

Class ICalTimeZone

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.TimeZone
      • biweekly.io.ICalTimeZone
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable

    public class ICalTimeZone
extends TimeZone
    A timezone that is based on an iCalendar VTimezone component. This class is not thread safe.
    Author:
    Michael Angstadt
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ICalTimeZone.Boundary
      Holds the timezone observance information of a particular date.

      • getObservance

        public Observance getObservance(Date date)
        Gets the observance that a date is effected by.
        Parameters:
        date - the date
        Returns:
        the observance or null if an observance cannot be found

      • getComponent

        public VTimezone getComponent()

        Gets the VTIMEZONE component that is being wrapped.

        Note that the ICalTimeZone class makes heavy use of caching. Any modifications made to the VTIMEZONE component that is returned by this method may effect the accuracy of this ICalTimeZone instance.

        Returns:
        the VTIMEZONE component
